features: Glade PlugIn Refills with Fresh-scented fragrance oils infused with notes of pink nectarine, tangy yuzu and blood orange
Yuzu & White Peach scented oils add a bright, celebratory shimmer to a fresh and fun classic
Use these Glade refills in any Glade PlugIns scented oil warmer
This Glade air freshener for homes is easy to use and replace for the maximum freshness
Infuse different-sized rooms with continuous, long-lasting Glade PlugIn scents of Yuzu & White Peach and feel your fresh
body.description: Feel your fresh with Glade PlugIns Scented Oil Air Freshener Refills with Yuzu & White Peach fresh fragrances. Transform the energy in your home when you use Peach & Yuzu fragrance oils made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehydes or nitro musks. The authentic champagne notes are bubbling with tart yuzu and ruby pink grapefruit and add a bright, celebratory shimmer to a fresh and fun classic. It's a scent that lets you immediately welcome fresh, fruity feels into your home using multidimensional, artfully layered aromas. Use these Glade refills in any Glade PlugIns scented oil warmer and infuse different-sized rooms with continuous, long-lasting fragrance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Glade PlugIns fragrance oil warmers make it easy to set the mood of any room. Simply plug in, insert the essential oil refill, and transform the vibe. The Glade 3-wick candle provides three times the glow of a Glade single wick candle. Se the vibe with your chosen fragrance and the candle's warm glow. Set the timer on your Glade automatic spray for controlled bursts of fresh fragrance. Choose between increments for automatic sprays of freshness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet with hint of citrus
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the item and it arrived within the normal 2 days. I plugged one in our living room and didn't realize I had turned it all the way up. The smell was extremely overpowering. So much so, I started to get a headache. After realizing it though, I turned it all the way down. The scent became much less settle. It has a sweet citrus like scent, reminded me of a grapefruit. When I ordered this, I had no idea what a yuzu was. I looked it up after I plugged it in, only to discover a yuzu is a korean citrus fruit. That's where the citrus hint was coming from!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent combination
reviews.reviewText: Peach and Lemon working together to make a great scent combination! Glade did a great job finding a balance between these two scents and I can't wait to buy more of these. What I really love is that the scent is somewhat strong so I can adjust the dials down and get the same scent without using so much...yeah!These fit all Glade plug-ins and work great. Given I've turned the dial down, I bet they last longer than expected. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this glade plug-in. It smells fresh and reminds me of spring. It has a really clean smell but not like chemical cleaners. Not overpowering. It has a pleasant smell that doesn’t smell like a strong perfume! It's a really great scent! You can use it all year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how this smells. I don’t feel smell to much to peach but still great!. It gives my home a nice fresh, sweet and clean ambiance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and light scent!
reviews.reviewText: Love this new scent. It’s very fresh, light, and not overwhelmingly peachy. Just the right amount of peach. Makes me excited for Spring. Was impressed how the scent carried into other rooms, even though it was just on the medium setting. I’m pretty picky when it comes to glade scents and have to say this one is a winner. I prefer the more natural and fresh scents. This one delivers on that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great scent if you are wanting something that isn’t too overpowering is has just the right fragrances that go together to make a great spring to summertime happiness to your home I am very pleased with the scent and will definitely be getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yuzu and white peach Glade plug-in refills.
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent of these yuzu and white peach refills! They’re fresh and fruity, and the aroma really fills the room! They are compatible with all of my glade plug ins, and the scent is long lasting. Very pleased, will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Clean Fresh Scent
reviews.reviewText: I really like this Yuzu & White Peach scent. It's a very clean nice scent but not too overpowering like woody or floral fragrances can be. 2 plug-ins were enough to spread the scent throughout my home. Unfortunately, although these plug-ins start out very strong, their lasting power decrease significantly after 2 weeks.
